metadataFields.name: Active Substance(s)
metadataFields.description: Common name(s) and form (e.g., Amoxicillin trihydrate)

metadataFields.name: Strength of Active Ingredient(s)
metadataFields.description: Per dosage unit or per ml

metadataFields.name: Excipient(s)
metadataFields.description: Including those with known effect (e.g., lactose, ethanol)

metadataFields.name: Manufacturer(s)
metadataFields.description: Names and sites responsible for manufacturing

metadataFields.name: Batch Release Site
metadataFields.description: Often listed in section 6.4 or annex

metadataFields.name: Therapeutic Indication(s)
metadataFields.description: Diseases/conditions the product is approved for

metadataFields.name: Special Populations
metadataFields.description: Use in pediatrics, elderly, renal/hepatic impairment

metadataFields.name: Contraindications
metadataFields.description: Conditions where drug should not be used

metadataFields.name: Interactions
metadataFields.description: Drug-drug, food, or diagnostic interaction info
